February 13, 1957
Mr. Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio-TV
Station WUOA {FM)
University of Alabama
Boot X
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon*
In our effort to make generally available in brief form the results of
principal U. S. and foreign studies into the uses of television for instructional
purposes, I should like to inquire about the availability of any present or
futurerreport on your current project for which the Fund for the Advancement of
Education is providing support. We would like to be sure all these projects are
included in our reports*
If you are not familiar with our Fact Sheets in this area, which are issued
as results become available, we would of course be glad tos send you a set in
exchange for your assistance*
Sincerely,
HJStdfc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
